checkIfProjectExists(bytes32).details: Checks if a project with the given hash exists.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

checkIfProjectExists(bytes32).return: A `bool` stating for the project`s existence.

clientsAverageRating(address).details: Calculates sum and number of MSAT scores of ended & rated projects for the given client`s address.

params._client: An `address` of the client to look up.

clientsAverageRating(address).return: An `uint` sum of all scores and an `uint` number of projects counted in sum.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getClientProjects(address).details: Returns hashes of all client`s projects

getMakerProjects(address).details: Returns hashes of all maker`s projects

getProjectArbiter(bytes32).details: Query for getting the address of an arbiter for the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectArbitrationFees(bytes32).details: Returns configured for the given project arbiter fees.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectArbitrationFees(bytes32).return: An `uint` fixed fee and an `uint8` share fee of the project's arbiter.

getProjectClient(bytes32).details: Query for getting the address of a client for the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectEndDate(bytes32).details: Query for getting end date of the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectEndDate(bytes32).return: An `uint` end time of the project

getProjectEscrowAddress(bytes32).details: Query for getting the address of Escrow contract clone deployed for the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectFeedbackWindow(bytes32).details: Query for getting the feedback window for a client for the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectMaker(bytes32).details: Query for getting the address of a maker for the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectMilestoneStartWindow(bytes32).details: Query for getting the milestone start window for a client for the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectMilestoneStartWindow(bytes32).return: An `uint8` milestone start window in days.

getProjectMilestonesCount(bytes32).details: Returns preconfigured count of milestones for a project with the given hash.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

getProjectMilestonesCount(bytes32).return: An `uint8` count of milestones set upon the project creation.

getProjectStartDate(bytes32).details: Query for getting the start date for the given project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

makersAverageRating(address).details: Calculates sum and number of CSAT scores of ended & rated projects for the given maker`s address.

params._maker: An `address` of the maker to look up.

makersAverageRating(address).return: An `uint` sum of all scores and an `uint` number of projects counted in sum.

rateProjectSecondParty(bytes32,uint8).details: Rate the second party on the project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.
params._rating: An `uint8` satisfaction score of either client or maker. Min value is 1, max is 10.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setRelayContractAddress(address).details: Set the new address of the `DecoRelay` contract.

params._newAddress: An address of the new contract.

startProject(string,address,address,addr.details: Creates a new milestone-based project with pre-selected maker and owner. All parameters are required.

params._agreementEncrypted: A `bool` flag indicating whether or not the agreement is encrypted.
params._agreementId: A `string` unique id of the agreement document for that project.
params._arbiter: An `address` of the referee to settle all escalated disputes between parties.
params._feedbackWindow: An `uint8` time in days project`s owner has to provide feedback for the last milestone.                       If that time is exceeded then maker can terminate the project and get paid for awaited                       milestone.
params._makersSignature: A `bytes` digital signature of the maker to proof the agreement acceptance.
params._milestoneStartWindow: An `uint8` count of days project`s owner has to start the next milestone.       If this time is exceeded then the maker can terminate the project.
params._milestonesCount: An `uint8` count of planned milestones for the project.

params._agreementHash: A `bytes32` hash of the project`s agreement id.

transferAnyERC20Token(address,uint256).details: Allows to trasnfer any ERC20 tokens from the contract balance to owner's address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Contract for Project events and actions handling.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
